levels.description: Attacks change to <@ba.vup>9</> hits, each dealing <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as damage to random enemies within Attack Range; each hit has a <@ba.vup>{attack@prob:0%}</> chance to <$ba.levitate>Levitate</> the target for <@ba.vup>{attack@levitate}</> second
